skill.name: baoyu-gemini-web
skill.description: Image generation skill using Gemini Web. Generates images from text prompts via Google Gemini. Also supports text generation. Use as the image generation backend for other skills like cover-image, xhs-images, article-illustrator.
skill.summary: Image generation skill using Gemini Web. Generates images from text prompts via Google Gemini. Also ...
skill.author: JimLiu

security_audit.summary: This is a legitimate AI skill that wraps Gemini Web API for text and image generation. The static analyzer flagged patterns typical for browser-based authentication tools: spawning Chrome for login, making API calls to Google's servers, and caching authentication cookies. All credential accesses are for local authentication storage with proper file permissions (0o600). No exfiltration, data harvesting, or malicious behavior detected.

content.user_title: Generate text and images with Gemini Web
content.value_statement: Access Google Gemini Web for AI-powered text generation and image creation. Uses browser-based authentication to handle Google login securely. Provides a foundation for other baoyu skills that need Gemini capabilities.
actual_capabilities: Generate text responses using Gemini Web models (gemini-3-pro, gemini-2.5-pro, gemini-2.5-flash)
Create images from text prompts using Gemini image generation
Support file uploads for image editing and multimodal prompts
Handle Google authentication via Chrome browser for cookie-based login
Cache authentication cookies locally for repeated use
Export results in plain text or JSON format
limitations: Requires Google Chrome/Chromium installation for authentication
Authentication expires and requires periodic re-login via browser
Limited to Gemini Web API endpoints - not full Gemini API feature parity
No built-in rate limiting - depends on Google quotas

use_cases.title: Create AI-generated images
use_cases.description: Generate marketing visuals, social media graphics, or creative illustrations from text descriptions.

use_cases.title: Integrate Gemini into workflows
use_cases.description: Use as backend for other skills needing AI text or image generation capabilities.

use_cases.title: Draft content with AI assistance
use_cases.description: Generate outlines, summaries, or creative text using Gemini conversational AI.

prompt_templates.title: Simple image
prompt_templates.prompt: A cozy coffee shop interior with warm lighting

prompt_templates.title: Detailed illustration
prompt_templates.prompt: A cyberpunk city street at night, neon signs, rain-slicked streets, photorealistic style, 4k resolution

prompt_templates.title: With model selection
prompt_templates.prompt: Explain quantum computing in simple terms for beginners -m gemini-2.5-pro

output_examples.input: A golden retriever puppy in a flower field
What are the benefits of renewable energy?
output: Renewable energy offers several key benefits:
• Reduced carbon emissions and climate impact

output_examples.input: A minimalist logo for a tech startup --image logo.png
output: A clean, modern logo design with geometric shapes and a blue color palette

best_practices: Run with --login first to authenticate, then use cached cookies for faster subsequent runs
Use --json flag when parsing output programmatically in other scripts
Set GEMINI_WEB_CHROME_PATH environment variable if Chrome is in a non-standard location
anti_patterns: Do not share cookie files between users - authentication is per-user
Avoid frequent re-authentication - cookies persist for extended periods
Do not rely on this for real-time applications without implementing your own rate limiting

faq.question: How does authentication work?
faq.answer: First run opens Chrome for Google login. Cookies are extracted via Chrome DevTools Protocol and cached locally for subsequent runs.

faq.question: Where are cookies stored?
faq.answer: Cookies are saved to ~/.local/share/baoyu-skills/gemini-web/cookies.json with restricted permissions (owner read/write only).

faq.question: What models are supported?
faq.answer: gemini-3-pro (default), gemini-2.5-pro, and gemini-2.5-flash. Use -m flag to select.

faq.question: Can I use this without Chrome?
faq.answer: No. Chrome or Chromium is required for the authentication flow. Edge with Chrome flags may also work.

faq.question: How often do I need to re-authenticate?
faq.answer: Cookies typically remain valid for weeks. Use --login flag when you see auth errors to refresh them.

faq.question: What is the image output format?
faq.answer: Images are saved as PNG files. Use --image flag to specify output path (defaults to generated.png).
